channel.title: Hyperlink In Game?
channel.description: Sorry for the title. For some reason these titles get more views and replies than titles that are descriptive and actually make sense.. So I've seen it done before on other servers, etc.. Is there a way I can create a hyperlink through the chat box?.. Like so when they login, they see "Click here to vote!" at the bottom?.. Thanks in advance.

item.title: Hyperlink In Game?
item.dc:creator: @0wn3r_k4t3 0wn3r k4t3
item.description:
@0wn3r_k4t3 wrote:

On my server if i type ::Vote it opens my vote page in there browser. is that wha you want

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperlink In Game?
item.dc:creator: @Raams Raams
item.description:
@Raams wrote:

Thats obviously client sided so you would have to add something in there like; if blah clicks x1,y1 x2,y2, then it would open whatever.
So in addition you would need to add the words for those coords to. Either on the clients side or on the servers side. I’ve done something simular to a client so I know.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperlink In Game?
item.dc:creator: @FuryofEdge FuryofEdge
item.description:

Sorry for the title. For some reason these titles get more views and replies than titles that are descriptive and actually make sense… So I’ve seen it done before on other servers, etc… Is there a way I can create a hyperlink through the chat box?.. Like so when they login, they see “Click here to vote!” at the bottom?.. Thanks in advance.
